title: Upscale. City Views. Urban Oasis
posting_body: Take advantage of a prime Downtown Detroit locale and all the best the city has to offer!
At Broderick Tower, everything you need is just minutes from home!
Our historic building is located at Grand Circus Park and Woodward, and provides you with unbeatable amenities, such as 24-hour valet service, a fitness center, and some paid utilities.
Make this spaciously-appointed, 2 bedroom/1.5-bath apartment your home, with interior features that include:
• Contemporary kitchen with stainless-steel appliances and granite countertops.
It would be a pleasure to have you as a resident with us at Broderick Tower!
To learn more and make our community your home, contact us today to schedule your exclusive tour.
